name: Hundred Beans
description:
Made in 2 days.

This is a game jam game.

WASD or Arrow keys to move last bean standing win.

And you can kill other beans to collide with them.

You can kill the bean that you collided with if you have more beans following than the bean. If it's not, it's game over.

Check out my Youtube channel: ClovyGameDev - YouTube
